g.text: In this case the value of the expression is true...
... meaning that the while body command is executed.
When done the control is brought back the logical expression
... which now is RE-evaluated. Variables in the logical expressions may have been changed
Let us assume that we reiterate ...
... through the command yet another time ...
... and back again to the controlling logical expresssion
... which is RE-evaluated a third time.
Now the expression becomes false. The while loop has run to the end.
